# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
### English: MINI-PORTABLE EMISSIONS MEASUREMENT SYSTEM
### French: SYSTÈME MINI-PORTATIF DE MESURE DES ÉMISSIONS

## Reference Number

## Notice Information
### Announcement Date: 2023-08-30
### Tender Closing Date: 2023-09-15T14:00:00 (Now CLOSED)
### Amendment Date: 2023-08-31
### Expected Contract Starting Date: 2023-09-30
### Expected Contract Ending Date: N/A
### Tender Status: Cancelled

## Procurement Category
### General Department (GD)

## Notice Type
### Advance Contract Award Notice (Préavis d’attribution du contrat)

## Procurement Method
### Advance Contract Award Notice (Préavis d'attribution du contrat)

## Trade Agreements
### The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

## Regions of Opportunity
### No regions specified

## Regions of Delivery
### National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contracting Entity
### Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
### Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

## End-User Entity
### Department of the Environment (ECCC)

## Contract Contact
### Watson Slater (SPAC/PSPC)
### Contact Information:
 Email: [slater.watson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:slater.watson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: Almost all the information is extracted from the original text. Formatting is a key aspect for this project, which is likely to have smooth flow, necessary headers and well-written information. Problem, without restrictions, might require excessive content chopping. If anything is unclear, please help me.
